Title: Flooded
Plot: With Joyce gone, Buffy finds herself trying to contend with burst pipes and home-improvement loans. She seeks out the advice of a just-returned Giles who expresses his concern over Willow's attitude toward bringing Buffy back. While trying to get a loan, Buffy's meeting is crashed by a demon, dispatched by a trio of bored, twenty-something would-be sorcerers who want to cause mischief (and to hypnotize Buffy and make her their love slave).   The demon makes its way to the Slayers home and Buffy
GuestStars: Todd Stashwick, Michael Merton, John Jabaley, Brian Kolb
